## Software


- **eDidaktikum** (2023)<br /> 
 24,731 students, teachers, educational managers and lecturers use eDidaktikum on a daily basis,
to collect and share materials and discuss learning and teaching.<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/centre-for-educational-technology/edidaktikum>
 
- **Vara** (2023)<br /> 
 A H5P-based platform to orchestrate learning activities in classrooms.<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/centre-for-educational-technology/vara>
 
- **laPills** (2023)<br /> 
 A feedback gathering system for classroom teaching practices.<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/centre-for-educational-technology/la_pills>

- **Tinda** (2022)<br /> 
 A platform to assess digital competencies of teachers in Estonia.<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/centre-for-educational-technology/tinda>

- **EzTest** (2021)<br /> 
 A lightweigh student testing system.<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/centre-for-educational-technology/EzTest>
